record.field: You need to define a check account in the journal "%(journal)s"
Check "%(check)s" is not in draft state
Issued check "%(check)s" is not in Issued state
Third check "%(check)s" is not in Held state
Third check "%(check)s" is not in Delivered state
To post voucher "%(voucher)s", you must define a sequence on fiscal year "%(fiscalyear)s".
You can not change voucher sequence in fiscal year "%(fiscal_year)s" because there are already posted vouchers in this fiscal year.
Fiscal year "%(first)s" and "%(second)s" have the same voucher sequence.
You have to enter pay mode lines!
You can not delete a voucher that is posted!

You can not post the voucher because it already has reconciled lines!

Lines:
%(lines)s
You can not post the voucher because Invoices amount is greater than Payment amount
You can not credit with refund invoice "%(invoice)s" because total amount is different than amount to pay.
The payment is related to multiple lines: %(lines)s.
